frames.caption: A young child rides atop a large bear through a bustling city street. The bear strides confidently, while the child holds onto a harness, smiling with a sense of adventure.
frames.description: The scene is set in an urban environment, with tall buildings lining the street. A child is riding a bear, creating a surreal and whimsical contrast against the city backdrop.

frames.caption: A young child rides atop a massive bear, holding onto a harness as they move through a bustling city street. The bear walks confidently alongside yellow taxis, creating a surreal juxtaposition of nature and urban life.
frames.description: The scene takes place in a busy city street, where a child is riding a large bear. The bear strides through the urban environment, surrounded by typical city elements like cars and tall buildings.

summary: People: child. Animals: bear. Objects: harness, taxi, buildings. Actions: riding, walking. Emotions: adventure, happiness, wonder. Scenes: urban, fantasy, city street. Concepts: surrealism, adventure, surreal, juxtaposition
